examples.example: 朋友的到来给我带来了无尽的欢乐。

translate.english: The arrival of friends has brought me endless joy.

examples.example: 春天的到来给大地带来了蓬勃的生机。

translate.english: The arrival of spring brings vigorous vitality to the earth.

examples.example: 志愿者们的行动给社区带来了温暖和关怀。

translate.english: The actions of the volunteers have brought warmth and care to the community.
